data.text:
Breakfast: Basic but good

Room: Great first impression.
Very Noisy, Beachclub has (very) loud music until 3 pm. 
You can hear every word from guests outside the room. When they close the door of the room next to yours, you can hear a loud bang and everything shakes.
You hear the shower and toilet very good from the room next to you. 

They clean uf the promenade and isntall or deinstall Party equipment at 6 am with forklifts and other loud equipment. The door from the balcony does not cancel the noise.
So don‚Äôt expect to sleep a lot here.

Bathroom has no Door, Toilet only Glassdoor (no nosie barrier)

Location:
Partymile, not great to relax.

Employees: 
very friendly and helpful.

Taxi: 
Inhouse Taxi service, expensive, they Drive very unsafe (had 3 almost crashes, on the cellphone while driving) they ask for the phone number and always annoy and text you, if you need a ride.

Beach:
Privat part, you get beachtowels, can‚Äôt bring own drinks (NOT EVEN WATER), they search your bag for water bottles.
Beachbar where you can buy dinks and food (from 12pm)
Not alot of sunshades. At 9am is every shadow space occupied.
data.title: Can‚Äôt Sleep

data.text: The room was really nice and clean and our room was cleaned daily with fresh sheets and towels! We loved our stay however the breakfast was not good. It was always cold and not many options at all. The hotel has a great location, great surrounding restaurants also!
data.title: Lovely!

data.text: I brought my wife to Dubai for her 40th Birthday and spent some time trying to find a good hotel that ticked all the boxes for us. Well we weren't disappointed! This hotel was perfect for our visit. Very central to all of Dubai's top attractions, had its own beach, 2 swimming pools and our room was just fabulous with a perfect view across the bay. The staff were great and were exceptional in looking after us during our stay. The food at breakfast was everything you could think of and more. Also there are two funky and lively bars at the beach entrance so we had to indulge in a few drinks at night. Situated on West Beach Promenade meant we could walk freely up and down the Palm to see all the beach bars and restaurants on offer or just go for a leisurely stroll. All in all a great hotel that we would recommend to all visiting Dubai.
data.title: Top Hotel In The Perfect Location With Great Food, Bars and Beach!!

data.text: We had an excellent stay with the Radisson beach resort on Jumeirah pal west beach, right next to the beach. There are lots of nice places for a drink and to eat along the golden mile, which the Radisson beach resort is part of. Excellent view and location. The staff was super friendly and helpful. The breakfast to very nice too.
data.title: Excellent location and the staff was friendly
